'''KHELEK''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "ice".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 364 (root appearing as "KHELEK-")</ref>
==Derivatives==
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[helke]]'' ("ice); ''[[helka]]'' ("ice-cold")<ref name=LR/><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 21</ref>
*[[Noldorin]]: ''heleg'' ("ice"); ''helch'' ("bitter cold")<ref name=LR/>

==See also==
*[[KHEL]] ("freeze")
